message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting strong, I'll try to counter!
You're being greedy, Bob! I'll give you a better deal
You're trying to squeeze me, but I'll squeeze back!
You're being too aggressive, Bob! Let's find a middle ground
You're getting desperate, I'll make it worth your while!
You're really squeezing me now, Bob! But I'll give you one more chance
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience!
I'm going all in, Bob! Take it or leave it
You're playing with fire, Alice. I'll take the last chance!
I'm out of options, Bob. You win
